About the Company: Mahasagar Travels Limited kindly known as Mahasagar Travels in Junagadh (Gujarat) Based leading travels company having its head office at Junagadh and wide franchisee network spread across Gujarat.All Major cities of Gujarat mainly Kodinar, Veraval, Somnath, Keshod, Dhoraji, Jetpur, Virpur, Gondal, Rajkot, Chotila, Ahmedabad, Baroda, Surat, Navsari, Vapi, Selvas, Mumbai Jamnagar and Bhavnagar are connected to Junagadh by daily Bus services..The company also in the business activities of Travels, Petroleum.
